display_long_description:
Climb smart. Punch hard. Stay high... This is King of the Hill.

Inspired by Gorilla Tag, King of the Hill is a fast-paced VR brawler that throws players into vertical chaos. Run, jump, wall-bounce, and launch yourself through the arena using nothing but your hands — and a well-timed punch or two.

Every match is a race to the top. Shove your rivals off cliffs, hold your ground, or sneak your way up while others battle it out. When the clock hits zero, the player standing highest claims victory — and everyone else gets a chance to try again in the next round.

🧩 Features:
🐒 Gorilla-style locomotion: no sticks, just skill

✊ Punch and push mechanics: chaotic close combat at every level

⏱ Round-based multiplayer: short, intense, and endlessly replayable

🧗 Vertical maps: multiple routes, hidden paths, and risky jumps

🎙 Proximity voice chat: trash talk or team up in real time

Ready to climb? The hill is waiting.
